channel.title: Cirnopk stork based client online now :)
channel.description:
I DO NOT actually own this client/website i am just advertising it as our clan have that many people we need new people to register now to up the population, if you enjoyed stork pk then you will enjoy cirnopk theres actually a great bunch of characters on there unlike some servers i know you get treat with respect and heped in game by most people.
here are a couple of videos to give you an idea what pking is like and clan wars
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sQ0C3-jMBk8[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BYC7qglaFS0[/youtube]
just click on http://cirnopk.com/ to register and download client this is a points based game to make sure to click on control panel to change stats and hopefully see you in game
